content.text:
# Micrurus stewarti

| genus = Micrurus
| species = stewarti
| authority = Barbour & Amaral, 1928
| range_map = Micrurus stewarti map.jpg
| range_map_caption =
}}
Micrurus stewarti, the Panamenian coral snake, is a species of snake of the family Elapidae.
The snake is found in Panama.
